sourcesContent:
const TOP_DEALS = [
    {
        id: 't1',
        name: 'Solid Polo T-Shirt',

    },
    {
        id: 't2',
        name: 'Round Neck T-Shirt',

        price: 809,
        image: './assets/Round_neck_tshirt.jpg',
        category: 'T-Shirts'
    },
    {
        id: 't3',
        name: 'Printed Polo T-Shirt',

        price: 2299,
        image: './assets/Printed_polo_tshirt.jpg',

    },
    {

        price: 1099,

    },

    {

];
